mapper.sql: eventId, title, longtitude, latitude, startTime, endTime, interval, category
mapper.insert: insert into event (eventId, title, longtitude, latitude, startTime, endTime, interval, category) values (#{eventid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

eventId,

update event
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longtitude = #{longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where eventId = #{eventid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
